description: A pseudo-resource that manages which of your ECS task sets is primary.

Cluster.description: The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster that hosts the service to create the task set in.
Cluster.markdownDescription:
The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster that hosts the service to create the task set in.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

TaskSetId.description: The ID or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task set.
TaskSetId.markdownDescription:
The ID or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task set.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Service.description: The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service to create the task set in.
Service.markdownDescription:
The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service to create the task set in.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement
